title: Is there any website where I can teach students for iit JEE and make some pocket money for myself? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can teach millions of knowledge seekers and make global change.  Inspire yourself from khanacademy by Salman Khan, Unacademy by Gaurav Munjal, mrunal(.)org by mrunal patel,pyoopel by Bharat Patodi, Edusaathi, avantifellows, digital study hall and more who have build free open educational video content and make a change in world.    You can make open educational videos and share it on online platforms for free access like YouTube.  You can also make your life story as great motivational story by teaching millions of knowledge seekers around the world using your smartphone. Cheapest way to start recording your video tutorials.  You can raise money to support your initiative using Crowdfunding sites like indiegogo, globalgiving, kickstarter, gofundme, kiva, ketto, bitgiving, milaap and more. you can also represent your project to incubators like villgro,unltd and more...

Yes for sure. You can create virtual classroom in CAREERKHOJJ app and create question banks and post test series. Interested students will join your class and eventually you will be able to charge fee for accessing your tests and materials. Currently it's not having payment gateway, but you will find it soon in coming month.
